verbose_text: By means of a GWAS including these newly derived traits of the LC-ESI-MS measured IgG glycopeptides in our discovery cohort from the KORA F4 study (n = 1,823), and a replication of the results for the same glycan panel in an additional 1,800 samples from LLS, we want to further investigate the underlying genetic control of IgG glycosylation.
